results.title: Early years at school
results.brief_description: This is a series of film dealing analytically with areas of importance and concern to teachers of children aged three to nine. Suitable for Tertiary level students and teachers.

results.title: Early trick films [1898-1912]
results.brief_description: Compilation including “The House that Jack built” (dir. G.A. Smith); “Upside down or the human flies” (dir. R.W. Paul); “The Brahmin and the butterfly” (dir. Georges Melies); “The Motorist” (dir. R.W. Paul); “The Magic screen”; “Dante’s inferno”; and in its entirety, “The Invisible thief”.
results.description: Compilation including “The House that Jack built” (dir. G.A. Smith); “Upside down or the human flies” (dir. R.W. Paul); “The Brahmin and the butterfly” (dir. Georges Melies); “The Motorist” (dir. R.W. Paul); “The Magic screen”; “Dante’s inferno”; and in its entirety, “The Invisible thief”.
description_for_label: Compilation including “The House that Jack built” (dir. G.A. Smith); “Upside down or the human flies” (dir. R.W. Paul); “The Brahmin and the butterfly” (dir. Georges Melies); “The Motorist” (dir. R.W. Paul); “The Magic screen”; “Dante’s inferno”; and in its entirety, “The Invisible thief”.
